attributes.long-description:
Bundle contains Virry VR: Feel the Wild and Virry VR: Wild Encounters experiences.

Go on a virtual safari without leaving your home, getting up close and personal with endangered wild animals from Northern Kenya in the BAFTA nominated Virry VR project.

Virry VR is a unique experience: you can feed wild lioness with no risk and feel her breath near your face. You just can’t get it at a zoo! Virry VR is a zoo of the future. It reconnects you and your beloved ones with nature and makes you feel united with the world. The bundle presents an amazing world of elephants, giraffes, rhinos just to mention a few. It’s not about passive watching in 360 but about experiencing: feeding, bathing, interacting, and learning about wildlife. Why bother? Because we only save what we love and we love what we know.

Virry VR is your everyday emotional detox recommended by psychologists.

Make your life happy and productive!

PS VR Compatible

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

Fountain Digital Labs Limited
attributes.name: Virry VR: Wild Bundle
